CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg. A1 reads: "Receive PANCA Awards - For outstanding accomplishments in securing 50 or more members for the NAACP during its recent campaign, Mrs. Virginia Valentine (left to right, front row), and William Frederick and Caretta Ogburn, received PANCA Awards from the campaign chairman, Louis L. Mason Jr., as (rear, left to right) the Rev. Charles H. Foggie and John G. Jones, NAACP president and treasurer, respectively, observe. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Virginia Valentine, William Frederick, and Coretta Ogburn receiving PANCA Awards from Louis L. Mason Jr., with Rev. Charles H. Foggie and John G. Jones in background, in church interior with stained glass windows, Fountain Funeral Home June 1958 calendar, and photograph of church building
